# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I'm proposing a special introductory price of $140 for you. This is a fantastic opportunity to experience the benefits of our product at a discounted rate compared to the standard price of $150. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you're interested in this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
